listObjectContents

public static <T> HashMap<String,T> listObjectContents(File folder,
                                                       Class<T> c)

listObjectContentsAsArray

public static <T> T[] listObjectContentsAsArray(File folder,
                                                Class<T> c)
lists the contents of the specified folder. first, all files of this folder are listed. then, an array is created, that is the same length as those files. the array element type is the class specified in this method. then, for each file, the file is deserialized (the contents of the file are read as an object through an ObjectInputStream created on that file), and added to the array. then the array is returned.

Parameters:
folder - the folder to list
c - the class of the objects to be deserialized, also the class of the return array.
Returns:
an array of deserialized objects, one for each file in this folder.
Throws:
ClassCastException - if the deserialized objects from any of the files are not instances of class c.
